# BlockChain
Made a Block-Chain typo for crytpo-currency Mining with ledger 

### Description:
This project was made with the knowledge of sha256 hash function whose library was Taken from zedwood.com

here we created a blockchain of blocks containing transaction details 
which would be mined 

note Difficulty for hash is only 4 i-e `0000` in start for easy mining

now we can insert data in blockchain class for first block
Note:Block 0(Genesis) is already pre-made

![Passing Values](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/44942652/149622090-fd9cc074-27ee-4be3-9bd0-19e4432d822b.jpg)

which would add blocks in the blockchain

and would result in 

![mining](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/44942652/149622107-f46faaff-034b-48d9-b023-3fc56f5bc81e.jpg)

Note: the reason sender and reciever details are in hash is due to privacy 

That's all folk!
